propositions.original_proposition: Electric vehicles represent 40% of all new vehicle registrations in 2023.
propositions.reworded_proposition: Electric vehicles have become a significant portion of new vehicle registrations in 2023.
propositions.chart_title: Proportion of Electric Vehicle Registrations in 2023
propositions.chart_description: Visual representation of the share of electric vehicles among new registrations in 2023.
propositions.reasoning: A donut chart effectively highlights the proportion of electric vehicles compared to other types, emphasizing their share in the total registrations.
tapas_questions: What percentage of new vehicle registrations are electric vehicles?
How does the proportion of electric vehicles compare to other types?
Which vehicle type has the highest share of new registrations?

propositions.original_proposition: Diesel vehicles account for the least number of registrations, making up only 10% of the total in 2023.
propositions.reworded_proposition: Diesel vehicles represent the smallest share of registrations in 2023, highlighting a preference for other vehicle types.

propositions.original_proposition: Hybrid vehicles have seen a 50% increase in their share of total registrations from 2019 to 2023.
propositions.reworded_proposition: Hybrid vehicles have increasingly become a larger part of total registrations over recent years.

propositions.original_proposition: The proportion of electric vehicles is highest in high-income boroughs, making up 60% of registrations.
